<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improved Poison Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=573) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 187 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48) (Level 10), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Poison Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=563)

</column>

---

You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects. When you apply a simple poison with Poison Weapon, the poison deals 2d4 poison damage instead of 1d4 poison damage. You don’t waste a poison you apply with Poison Weapon on a critically failed attack roll.

<title level="2">Improved Poison Weapon leads to...</title>
[Deadly Poison Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1151)
name: Improved Poison Weapon
